snippet: A coalition national government led by the Indian National Congress Party demonstrated little political vision, analysts agree, and even less political backbone.
abstract: News analysis; ugly political year in India ends with an ugly political spectacle as Indian lawmakers, shouting and bickering in a nationally televised session, allow Parliament to adjourn for the year without voting on measure to create an independent anticorruption agency.
lead_paragraph: A coalition national government led by the Indian National Congress Party demonstrated little political vision, analysts agree, and even less political backbone.

headline.seo: India Ends Year of Political Bickering and Government Inaction
headline.main: Political Bickering and Government Inaction Marked the Year in India
headline.print_headline: Political Bickering and Government Inaction Marked the Year in India
